decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Unnumbered Plans: Proposed Front & Rear, Location Plan, Proposed Plans/Sections/Axonometric, Proposed Section L02, Received: 26/05/2016. Existing Front & Rear Elevations, Existing/Plans/Sections/Axonometric, Received: 03/06/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Erection of a single storey rear infill extension and rear roof extension incorporating 3 front roof windows to the house
